stocks.ai_explanation: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company Limited (TSM), a major semiconductor manufacturer, is expected to play a crucial role in the future of semiconductors. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.
Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) is a leading processor maker and a key player in the semiconductor industry. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.
Applied Materials, Inc. (ASML) is a Dutch multinational equipment manufacturer specializing in semiconductor processing equipment. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.
Intel Corporation (INTC) is a leader in microprocessors and other computing components. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.
Qualcomm Technologies, Inc. (QCOM) is a leading provider of mobile communication technologies. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.

disclaimer: Educational use only. Not financial advice.
